entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0162.10084] The filer has used an invalid trading symbol of n/a. If a trading symbol is not applicable then use the no trading symbol flag element 'dei:NoTradingSymbolFlag'. The trading symbol cannot contain special characters such as #, %, $, *, ", !, @, ^, & or Invalid Tickers such as n/a, NONE, -, NOT APPLICABLE, N/A . In addition tickers should be entered in upper-case. If the ticker is a preferred security the element Security12bTitle should be tagged to indicate that it is a preferred security.
The properties of this dei:TradingSymbol fact are: Period :2022-07-01 to 2023-06-30 Dimensions : dei:EntityListingsExchangeAxis=exch:XNYS
Rule Element Id:10084 Rule version: 26.0.9 - hmy-20230630.htm 4
